entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then clearing. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
